attributes.action: Stop the UK setting up the new deep coal mine in Cumbria.
attributes.additional_details: The impact and fight against Climate change will define our planet for the next hundred years. With the U.K. aiming to champion the transition to a greener economy, the existence of proposals like this will make us a laughing stock in the global community. Post-Brexit; at a time where we need to secure our position as a prominent global figure, we need to innovate the industries of the future and bury the outdated methods of the past.
attributes.background: The government must intervene and stop the creation of the mine. Show the country that the impact of fossil fuels on our planet is not a “local issue”. Each decision made that will be a detriment to our environment must be scrutinised and evaluated on a national level before it is approved.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568475
